nodes.bodyText: Does Hadolint have a mailing list or chat? Can you please ask for a permission to reuse the icon? Icons are sometimes problematic to reuse.

nodes.bodyText: I now have feedback at hadolint/hadolint#449 (comment) - is sufficient from your point of view?
